name: Desert Apache
overview: A full motion video game, like playing a grainy movie. inspired by Tomcat Alley on the Sega CD. First with Tomcat; a very limited demo game, in 1994, and then Desert Apache in 1995. The atmosphere in this was very impressive for its time, but gameplay is limited to choosing targets on a map, and manually aiming a crosshair to destroy them. The whole game plays like a short movie,
